info.name: Document Freedom Day - Poster
info.description:
The poster of our Document Freedom Day campaign. The poster is two-sided with one side in English only and the other side in multiple languages.
Order from our stock in: One side English, the other side: English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish
info.languages: A2 - Front in English - Back Multilingual, A3 - Front in English - Back Multilingual
info.printed: A3 & A2; one side English, other side multi-lingual.
info.author: FSFE
